summary: Both REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be addressed in the diff. REQ-1 is fixed via explicit CSS rules in index.css forcing visible text/placeholder colors on input and textarea elements, plus explicit Tailwind classes on the BuilderPage textarea. REQ-2 is fixed via a reworked BuilderPage handleGenerate function that calls generateFromPrompt, saves to backend via useGenerateAppCreation, navigates to the viewer, shows loading state, and surfaces errors. The backend main.mo now has the generateAppCreation endpoint. No significant missing requirements were detected.

hallucinated_features.description: A migration module (backend/migration.mo) was added to handle data migration from an old 'items' map to a new 'appCreations' map, including a migration annotation in main.mo.
hallucinated_features.reason: Neither REQ-1 nor REQ-2 requested a data migration module or any backend schema migration logic. This is additional infrastructure not mentioned in the build request.

hallucinated_features.description: Share and unshare functionality (shareAppCreation, unshareAppCreation, getSharedAppCreation) was added or updated in the frontend hooks and components.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asks for fixing prompt visibility and fixing the creation flow. Share/unshare features are beyond the stated requirements.
